abstract: Ultimate Fighting Championship fighter Anderson Silva denies taking performance-enhancing drugs.
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian fighter said in a statement published on his Instagram account that he was not a cheat and that he had “never used any substances” to improve his performances.

headline.main: Anderson Silva Denies That He Used Drugs
headline.print_headline: Silva Denies That He Used Drugs

snippet: The Brazilian fighter said in a statement published on his Instagram account that he was not a cheat and that he had “never used any substances” to improve his performances.
